CustomField.formula:
IF(NOT (ISBLANK ( Term_Transfer_Stopped__c )) , "Term/Transfer Stopped"&BR()& ( IF(ISPICKVAL( NPR_CPR_Resolution__c , "Client Saved - Keeping Payroll"), "Client Saved - Keeping Payroll"&BR(),"")&
IF(ISPICKVAL( NPR_CPR_Resolution__c , "Client Saved - Set Up Non Payroll"), "Client Saved - Set Up Non Payroll"&BR(),"")&
IF( Flag_Notes_as_Important__c ==True, "See Termination Milestone Notes"&BR(), "")
) , ( IF( ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy__c , "Yes") && ISBLANK( Discrepancy_Closed_Date__c ) , "Unresolved Paperwork Discrepancy"&BR(), "") & IF( Effective_Date_of_Termination__c > Today(), "Future Effective Date"&BR(), "") & IF(NOT (ISBLANK ( Date_NPR_Callout_Sent_to_CPR__c )) && ISBLANK( Retention_Call_Completed__c ) , "CPR NPR Callout"&BR(), "") & IF(ISPICKVAL( NPR_CPR_Resolution__c , "Client Saved - Keeping Payroll"), "Client Saved - Keeping Payroll"&BR(),"")& IF( Flag_Notes_as_Important__c ==True, "See Termination Milestone Notes"&BR(), "")& IF(ISPICKVAL( NPR_CPR_Resolution__c , "Client Saved - Set Up Non Payroll"), "Client Saved - Set Up Non Payroll"&BR(),"") ) )
CustomField.label: Pending POP Tasks
